description: Spencer Reed binds Gianni Luca with duct tape and throws him in the back of the van for a joy ride. He pulls into an auto garage and not long before the mechanics and customers join in with the fun. They give the boy a hard face fuck and make him crawl around dragging the car tires in public. The hungry car whore begs for more so Spencer strings him up on the car lift for a good old fashion gang bang. With a worn out juicy hole and face full of cum, the car whore is used up and spent for the day.
title: Car Whore
